SCRIPT.MSCRI:
! --------------- file path ----------------------------------------- : SET &AGENT_CURR_DIR# = GET_VAR('UC_EX_PATH_TEMP', &AGENT#) : SET &UC4RB_OPS_FILENAME# = "&UC4RB_OPS_FILENAME#-&$RUNID#.xml" : set &UC4RB_OPS_FILE_PATH# = STR_CAT(&AGENT_CURR_DIR#,&UC4RB_OPS_FILENAME#)
! ----------------- Writing File------------------------------------- : PRINT &UC4RB_OPS_FILE_CONTENT# : SET &HND# = CREATE_PROCESS(NEW) : SET &RET# = PUT_PROCESS_LINE(&HND#, &UC4RB_OPS_FILE_CONTENT#) : SET &RET# = WRITE_PROCESS(&HND#,&UC4RB_OPS_FILE_PATH#,&AGENT#,&LOGIN#,OVERWRITE) : CLOSE_PROCESS &HND# : IF &RET# > 0 : PRINT "Error in writing file to path : &UC4RB_OPS_FILE_PATH#" : PSET &UC4RB_OPS_FILE_PATH# = "" : ELSE : PUBLISH &UC4RB_OPS_FILE_PATH# ,,"TOP" : ENDIF
